title: Google Application Engineer L3
content:
Years of Experience: 8 years
Current Company: US Prod Based company
Currnet Role: Senior Software Engineer
Current CTC: 31.08L Fixed + 10% bonus
Date of the Offer: December 2023
Company: Google
Title/Level:  Application Engineer L3
Location: Hyderabad
Base Pay: 19.3L
Equity: 38000 USD vested over 4 years
Bonus: 15% of base pay (2.8L)
Total comp (Salary + Stocks + Bonus ): (19.3 + 2.8 + 8) 30L

I know that it is not a great role. I attended to just to see if I can get google brand on my resume by not so competitive role. However, It seems not at all worth to move with the offer. What are your thoughts?
